qas.question: How many dates did Beyonce's "The Mrs. Carter Show" entail?
One of Beyonce's most successful tours yet was which one?
Beyonce wrote which song for the movie "Epic"?
Beyonce voiced a character in which animated film?
Of what event was Beyonce honorary chair?
What part did she voice for the movie Epic?
What song did Beyonce record for the film Epic?
What was the name of Beyoncé's tour that she started on April 15?

answers.text: The Mrs. Carter Show World Tour

qas.question: How many dates did the Mrs. Carter Show World Tour have?
Which Amy Winehouse song did Beyoncé cover and release in May 2014?
Beyoncé was an honorary chair of the 2013 what?
Which character in the film, Epic, was voiced by Beyoncé?

context: Beyoncé embarked on <a1_0><a8_0>The Mrs. Carter Show<a1_0/> World Tour<a8_0/> on <a4_0>April 15<a4_0/> in Belgrade, Serbia; the tour included <a0_0><a9_0>132<a9_0/><a0_0/> dates that ran through to March 2014. It became the most successful tour of her career and one of the most-successful tours of all time. In May, Beyoncé's cover of Amy Winehouse's "<a10_0>Back to Black<a10_0/>" with André 3000 on The Great Gatsby soundtrack was released. She was also honorary chair of the <a5_0>2013 <a11_0>Met Gala<a5_0/>.<a11_0/> Beyoncé voiced <a6_0><a12_0>Queen Tara<a12_0/><a6_0/> in the 3D CGI animated film, <a3_0>Epic<a3_0/>, released by 20th Century Fox on May 24, and recorded an original song for the film, "<a2_0><a7_0>Rise Up<a7_0/><a2_0/>", co-written with Sia.
